Reason: The 'max_hint_window_in_ms' configuration is performance-sensitive because it directly impacts system performance by affecting the generation of hints for dead hosts. The time-expensive operation of generating hints is directly tied to this configuration, and if the value is set too short, it can lead to data loss or inconsistency in the system. This configuration involves performance-related operations that are time-extensive within its related code and can lead to notable performance variations at the system level.
